desc: Lumen Read is a free EPUB reader browser extension. Read multiple books at the same time. Read seamlessly in your browser.

0.title: Browser Extension
0.desc: Lumen Read is a browser extension, seamlessly integrated into your browsing experience.

1.title: Offline first
1.desc: Lumen Read can be run offline, and updates automatically.

2.title: Grid layout
2.desc: Lumen Read supports (horizontal) grid layout, which allows you to read multiple books at the same time.

3.title: Custom cloud storage
3.desc: Store your books, notes, reading progress and even other data in the cloud you specified.

0.a: Download from the Chrome Web Store or load the unpacked extension in developer mode.

1.a: Click the extension icon to open the reader, then drag and drop your EPUB files or click the add button.

2.a: Your data is stored locally in your browser, using IndexedDB. If you upload a book, there will be a remote copy in the cloud.

3.a:
Local data: clear the browser cache.
Remote data: select and delete the book you want to clear (this will also clear the local one).
